itemInfo.itemDesc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Grinding a Rough Ruby.

item.name: Rough Ruby
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing. Rough Ruby requires a certain level of skill to collect.\n- How to Obtain: It can be directly obtained from rock containing Gemstones.

item.name: Bares Necklace
item.desc: A necklace that draws out hidden destructive energy.\nIt can be Enhanced with the same type of necklace, but if Enhancement fails, both will be lost.

item.name: Elisha Necklace
item.desc: A necklace that gives serenity to its wearer.\nIt can be Enhanced with the same type of necklace, but if Enhancement fails, both will be lost.

item.name: Bares Earring
item.desc: An earring that draws out hidden destructive energy.\nIt can be Enhanced with the same type of earring, but if Enhancement fails, both will be lost.

item.name: Elisha Earring
item.desc: An earring that gives serenity to its wearer.\nIt can be Enhanced with the same type of earring, but if Enhancement fails, both will be lost.

item.name: Bares Ring
item.desc: A ring that draws out hidden destructive energy.\nIt can be Enhanced with the same type of ring, but if Enhancement fails, both will be lost.

item.name: Elisha Ring
item.desc: A ring that gives serenity to its wearer.\nIt can be Enhanced with the same type of ring, but if Enhancement fails, both will be lost.

item.name: Bares Belt
item.desc: A belt that draws out hidden destructive energy.\nIt can be Enhanced with the same type of belt, but if Enhancement fails, both will be lost.

item.name: Elisha Belt
item.desc: A belt that gives serenity to its wearer.\nIt can be Enhanced with the same type of belt, but if Enhancement fails, both will be lost.

item.name: [Witch] Calpheon Noble Dress
item.desc:
A dress for Calpheon aristocrats. It's both fabulous and practical.
- Item effect: Amity +15% from a conversation
※ If you use a costume exchange coupon, you'll get the same dress with an additional effect of moving speed +2. The costume can be equipped in the same slot as the pearl costume.
If you exchange it for a costume, you cannot register it to the Marketplace.

item.name: [Valkyrie] Calpheon Noble Dress
item.desc:
A dress worn by Calpheon aristocrats. It's both fabulous and practical.

- Item Effect: Amity +15% from a conversation

※ If you use a costume exchange coupon, you will get the same dress with an additional effect of Movement Speed +2. The costume can be equipped in the same slot as a pearl costume.

If you exchange it for a costume, you cannot register it to the Item Marketplace.

item.name: Blood Ruby Necklace
item.desc: A necklace decorated with a Blood Ruby.

item.desc: A necklace decorated with a Resplendent Ruby.

item.name: Resplendent Ruby
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Grinding a Rough Ruby. It requires the knowledge of Grinding: Beginner.

※ Find Ornella in Heidel and complete the Materials for Equipment Repair Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Level 14 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.
